summary: A cowardly actor and a runaway princess are voyaging on a ship that is captured by a notorious pirate who recently buried his treasure on a secretly mapped island.
cast: Bob Hope|Virginia Mayo|Walter Brennan|Walter Slezak|Victor McLaglen|Marc Lawrence|Hugo Haas|Maude Eburne|Adia Kuznetzoff|Brandon Hurst|Tom Kennedy|Stanley Andrews|Robert Warwick|Ernie Adams|Betty Alexander|Richard Alexander|Ted Billings|Al Bridge|Ruth Caldwell|Jack Carr|Alma Carroll|Vic Christy|Bing Crosby|Loretta Daye|Ralph Dunn|James Flavin|Francis Ford|Stewart Garner|Kit Guard|Bobbie Hale|Chuck Hamilton|Rondo Hatton|Oscar 'Dutch' Hendrian|Weldon Heyburn|Al Hill|Louanne Hogan|Bill Hunter|Colin Kenny|Jack Low|Mike Mazurki|Pat McKee|Robert Milasch|Art Miles|Lillian Molieri|Frank Moran|Kay Morley|Edward Peil Sr.|Dick Rich|Bert Roach|Constantine Romanoff|Harry Semels|Jack Shea|Charles Soldani|Ray Spiker|Edwin Stanley|Sammy Stein|Ray Teal|Betty Thurston|Tom Tyler|Ruth Valmy|Crane Whitley|Harry Wilson
title: La princesa y el pirata
